channel.title: Canceling
channel.description:
Canceling... Yep I'm getting rid of my Pure, gonna make him F2P and then keep him untill i might need him again. I know pures are dead but I spent ages on this pure so I'm gonna F2P him. Basicly I'm getting rid of all the member stuff for money, buying F2P Stuff, I'll be selling all the member junk for the lowest price tradable (Link here soon) so here are the items i want for him: (please do tell me what i should/shouldn't have)
[b]Melee Suit:[/b] Iron Helm Iron Body Green D' Hide Legs Iron Kite Str ammy Leather Boots Leather Gloves Red Cape Rune Scimmy
[b]Mage Suit:[/b] Wizard Hat Wizard Body Blue Skirt Magic ammy Air/Fire/Water/Earth Staff Leather boots Leather gloves Black cape
[b]Ranger Suit:[/b] Monk robe Green D'hide legs Maple Bow 2k Bronze/Iron/[s]Steel/Mith/Addy[/s] arrows Black cape Leather boots leather gloves Amulet of accuracy
My bank for my pure will be X10 of everything there and some money and lobbys.
Will post more info
Goin to create selling thread.

item.title: Canceling
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I think you ought to stock up on alot of runes… 50k elementals and 10k chaos and deaths. You’ll spend most of your cash on that :).

Read full topic
